attributes.action: Change JSA application process so that it is not designed to stop people claiming their entitlements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system of claiming for JSA is designed to prevent honest Job-seekers from Claiming benefits they are entitled to

1. Insisting on a 45-60 minute phone call to make a claim

2. Insisting on the above to transfer a claim from one office to another

3. Requesting information that is immaterial to the claim and should be private

4. Not possible to make an appointment to see anyone in person

In addition this time means job-seekers are unable to look for work or speak to employers for long periods of time
